ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
Monty is the missing complement to Python. Monty implements supplementary useful functions
for Python that are not part of the standard library. Examples include useful utilities like
transparent support for zipped files, useful design patterns such as singleton and cached_class,
and many more.
about.summary: Monty is the missing complement to Python.

about.description:
Monty is the missing complement to Python. Monty implements supplementary useful functions
for Python that are not part of the standard library. Examples include useful utilities like
transparent support for zipped files, useful design patterns such as singleton and cached_class,
and many more.
about.summary: Monty is the missing complement to Python.

name: monty
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "monty" %}
{% set version = "2026.2.18" %}
{% set python_min = "3.11" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/monty-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e34e77abe7454ab84a9eeab7d909dbb500e3fa114c1849352ecd4570feb72be0

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
    - setuptools-scm
    - pip
  run:
    - numpy
    - ruamel.yaml
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  imports:
    - monty
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/materialsvirtuallab/monty
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.rst
  summary: Monty is the missing complement to Python.
  description: |
    Monty is the missing complement to Python. Monty implements supplementary useful functions
    for Python that are not part of the standard library. Examples include useful utilities like
    transparent support for zipped files, useful design patterns such as singleton and cached_class, 
    and many more.
  doc_url: https://materialsvirtuallab.github.io/monty/
  dev_url: https://github.com/materialsvirtuallab/monty

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - shyuep
    - jan-janssen
